entities.description: A question asked in the context of a survey to gather specific data.
Use of substances such as cocaine within a specific time frame.
The specific time period within which a survey question refers, such as the year before last.
The possible answers to survey questions, including their frequencies and percentages.

relationships.description: Indicates the responses to a specific survey question and their corresponding frequencies and percentages.
Relates a survey question to a specific time frame, such as the year before last.
Indicates that the survey question pertains to the use of substances, in this case, cocaine.
